cs35013s.view

Class MapperAltitude

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs35013s.view.A_Mapper<DescriptorVertical,cs35013s.datatype.Altitude>
      • cs35013s.view.MapperAltitude

  • public class MapperAltitude
extends A_Mapper<DescriptorVertical,cs35013s.datatype.Altitude>
    Defines a mapper that translates altitudes between a view and the world.
    Author:
    Dan Tappan [28.04.13]
